ModMetaData.name: ParanoidAndroid
ModMetaData.author: Chris
ModMetaData.description:
A RimWorld mod inspired by the classic game Paradroid. Take control of robotic entities through hacking and tactical manipulation.
Features: - Hackable robots and mechanoids - Neural interface devices - Robot control mechanics - Paradroid-style gameplay mechanics
This mod brings the strategic robot takeover mechanics from Paradroid into the RimWorld universe.
